properties.areaDesc: Lawrence, IL; Crawford, IL; Knox, IN; Sullivan, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 10:12AM EST until January 4 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...Wabash River...White River...

.Precipitation on Sunday and Monday have led to minor flooding conditions
along some points of the East Fork White...White...and Wabash Rivers.
Significant flooding is not expected.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site.
* from Thursday evening to Saturday afternoon.
* There have been no observations in the last 24 hours.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It is forecast to rise above flood stage Thursday
evening, crest at 16.2 feet Friday morning, and then fall below
flood stage by late Friday night.
* At 16.0 feet...Old Darwin Road and a few low rural roads between
York and Hutsonville, Illinois begin to flood.  Agricultural
flooding begins along portions of the river.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
